analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x2cc6ea7c458c9a58a2d721172939415eb2488cf6.sol:
	Contract tbriks has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ea7c458c9a58a2d721172939415eb2488cf6.sol#202)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of tbriks.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ea7c458c9a58a2d721172939415eb2488cf6.sol#203) is not in mixedCase
